Package uk.rib.armouryoftheguardian

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DownloadWeaponImageTask
    This downloads and returns the end user's selected weapon's specified image.
    MainActivity
    The main activity of Armoury of the Guardian.
    RecyclerAdapter
    This is a base class for an Adapter.
    RecyclerAdapter.RecyclerViewHolder
    This extends RecyclerView.ViewHolder, with a ViewHolder describing an item view and metadata about its place within the RecyclerView.
    Weapon
    This is for the weapon screen and gets the end user's selected weapon's name, picture, definition, statistics, and potential perks.
    WeaponPerk
    This sets the viewing of the end user's selected weapon's perks.
    WeaponPerkActivity
    This is the activity for viewing the end user's selected weapon's perk.
    WeaponPerkSocket
    This creates the end user's selected weapon's perk sockets, which is where the perks go.
    WeaponStatistics
    This is for the end user's selected weapon's statistics.
    WeaponStatisticsAdapter
    The weapon statistics adapter.
    WeaponStatisticsAdapter.WeaponStatisticViewHolder
    Set some views of the WeaponStatisticViewHolder.
    WeaponViewActivity
    This is the logic for the end user's selected weapon's inspection screen.
